amendatorysection.para: Every livestock auction market operator shall pay annually, on or before August 1, a market license fee of one hundred fifty dollars to the board for each livestock auction market operated by him or her, which payment shall constitute a renewal for one year. Fees so paid shall be remitted to the State Treasurer for credit to the Livestock Auction Market Fund for the use of the board in paying the expenses of administration of the Livestock Auction Market Act.
